name: Vaporwho?
description:
This was a game made for the Weekly Game Jam Week #66 in which i made a simple platformer that i couldn't finish with the theme of Vaporwave.

The music being used comes from a kind person known to me as Stevia Sphere, you can get his tunes over at: https://steviasphere.bandcamp.com/music

The controls for the game are pretty simple, left and right arrow key to move horizontally and space bar to jump. Yellow squares are power-ups and the gray ones that turn yellow on touch are the checkpoints, if you press R you will be transported to the last Checkpoint you activated. The game so far only has 2 levels but i will be working on it later to add more to it.

Feel Free to ask any question or give me any pointers will take those to the heart and try to improve for the next one.
